author: johnalison
body:
Add track-to-track validation tool plugin. Added instances for general HLT track monitoring and in BTV specific paths #31038


PR description:
Adding plugin to compare two different track collections.
Creates relative efficiencies, fake rates, and resolutions

Configured track-to-track validator in the DQM monitor to monitor HLT tracks relative to offline tracks.
Two sets of monitoring plots configured, one with high-purity tracks and another with high-purity tracks from the PV.

Configured track-to-track validator in the BTVOffline

PR validation:
Standard runTheMaxtrix and look at the DQM plots produced
title: Add track-to-track validation tool plugin. Added instances for general HLT track monitoring and in BTV specific paths
